newsitem.title: USA: Interface Systems Q2 affected by writeoff.
newsitem.headline: Interface Systems Q2 affected by writeoff.

text.p: Interface Systems Inc said Friday a writeoff and other adjustments totaling $1.8 million hurt its March 31 second quarter, resulting in a loss of $1.5 million or $0.34 per share for the period.
In the year earlier period, the company reported a profit of $364,000 or $0.08 cents per share.
The company cited the changing printer market and its shift to a greater emphasis on delivering software products.

"We have written off $1,455,000 of inventory primarily related to the printer business," said president Bob Nero in a statement. "The company has also written off approximately $320,000 of capitalized software, most of which is also printer business related."
